data.description: Automatic install of dependencies via CPAN
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
ExtUtils::AutoInstall lets module writers to specify a more
    sophisticated form of dependency information than the PREREQ_PM
    option offered by ExtUtils::MakeMaker.

    Prerequisites are grouped into features, and the user could choose
    yes/no on each one's dependencies; the module writer may also supply
    a boolean value via -default to specify the default choice.
